definition[0]_en: Generation designation for an audio recording comprising the original recorded version of a tape from which copies can be made. (Deprecated)
ToolkitDefinition_en: Generation designation for an audio recording comprising the original recorded version of a tape from which copies can be made. (Deprecated)

definition[0]_en: Generation designation for an audio recording comprising a negative metal copy of a recording cut (typically) onto a lacquer-coated disc by means of a disc lathe; the lacquer original is destroyed in the process. The term master can also apply to the lacquer original if it has not been used to create a metal father. (Deprecated)
ToolkitDefinition_en: Generation designation for an audio recording comprising a negative metal copy of a recording cut (typically) onto a lacquer-coated disc by means of a disc lathe; the lacquer original is destroyed in the process. The term master can also apply to the lacquer original if it has not been used to create a metal father. (Deprecated)
